Laragod - Laravel Applications That Scal: Laragod - Laravel Applications That Scale Beyond MVP
footer.tagline: Laravel applications that scale beyond MVP. Code that doesn't become your problem later.
home.hero.description: Laravel applications that scale beyond MVP—because your business won't stay small forever, and your code shouldn't hold you back.
home.philosophy.paragraph1: Anyone can spin up a WordPress site in an afternoon. Need a contact form? Plugin. Need e-commerce? Another plugin. Need it to integrate with your CRM, scale to 100k users, and not fall apart when your intern touches it? Good luck.
home.philosophy.paragraph2: We build the other kind—the kind that doesn't become your problem six months later. Laravel applications that are approachable for your team, scalable beyond MVP, and maintainable without needing the original developer on speed dial.
home.philosophy.quote: Business cares about results. We do too. But we also care that your codebase isn't technical debt from day one.
home.services.title: Our Services
home.services.description: Founder-led, with trusted senior developers brought in as project scope demands
services.custom_web_apps.title: Custom Web Applications
services.custom_web_apps.description: Bespoke Laravel applications built from scratch, tailored to your exact business requirements. No templates, no compromises.
services.api_development.title: API Development & Integration
services.api_development.description: RESTful APIs, GraphQL, third-party integrations. Connect your systems seamlessly with payment gateways, CRMs, and more.
services.laravel_filament.title: Laravel + Filament Admin Panels
services.laravel_filament.description: Powerful, beautiful admin panels with Filament. Manage your application with ease—no bloated WordPress dashboard.
services.mvp_development.title: MVP Development
services.mvp_development.description: Launch fast without cutting corners. We build MVPs that can actually scale when your business takes off.
services.legacy_modernization.title: Legacy Code Modernization
services.legacy_modernization.descriptio: Stuck on PHP 5.6? We migrate and modernize legacy applications to current Laravel versions with comprehensive testing.
services.code_quality.title: Code Quality & Standardization
services.code_quality.description: PHPStan, Pint, Rector, comprehensive testing. We eliminate code smells and improve developer experience for your entire team.
services.consulting.title: Technical Consulting / Fractional CTO
services.consulting.description: Strategic technical guidance without the full-time hire. Architecture reviews, team mentoring, and roadmap planning.
services.devops.title: DevOps & Deployment
services.devops.description: CI/CD pipelines, hosting setup, performance optimization. We handle the infrastructure so you can focus on your business.
services.team_augmentation.title: Team Augmentation
services.team_augmentation.description: Plug us into your dev team short-term. We match your pace, adopt your tools, and deliver without the HR overhead.
home.pricing.title: You Get What You Pay For
home.pricing.description: Code quality isn't extra. It's the difference between scaling and starting over.
home.pricing.item1: Clean, tested, maintainable code (PHPStan, Pest, Laravel Pint)
home.pricing.item3: Documentation your team can actually use
home.pricing.item4: Code that doesn't become technical debt from day one
home.pricing.full_service_description: Need project management, QA testing, DevOps, hosting setup, and CI/CD? Full-service projects are priced individually based on scope. We'll give you a straight answer, not a sales pitch.
home.cta.heading: Ready to build something that lasts?
home.cta.description: Let's talk about your project. No sales fluff, just straight talk from developers who care about the craft.
about.hero.description: Laragod is founder-led out of the UK, with trusted senior developers brought into the fold as project scope demands. We're not flashy salesmen—we're developers who take pride in doing a good job.
about.origin.title: The Name
about.origin.paragraph1: The name? A colleague dubbed me "Laragod" years ago after I played a vital role in migrating the legacy app to a new codebase. The name stuck—and so did the standard we hold ourselves to.
about.origin.paragraph2: Does it sound a bit cheeky? Sure. But here's the thing: we're not claiming to be gods. We're claiming to give a damn about the craft. In an industry full of agencies that treat code like disposable widgets, that apparently makes us stand out.
about.origin.paragraph3: We've spent 10 years building web applications and 8 years deep in Laravel. We've seen the inside of big-name agencies. We've watched the smoke-and-mirror tactics. We've inherited the messes they leave behind. We decided to do better.
about.philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
about.philosophy.description: How we think about code and why it matters
about.philosophy.foundations.title: Quick Wins vs. Lasting Foundations
about.philosophy.foundations.description: You can build a house on sand quickly. We build on concrete—takes a bit longer upfront, but you can actually add a second floor later without it collapsing.
about.philosophy.quality.title: Code Quality Isn't Optional
about.philosophy.quality.description: PHPStan, comprehensive testing, proper architecture—these aren't "nice to haves." They're the difference between a codebase that scales and one that becomes your biggest liability.
about.philosophy.dx.title: Developer Experience Matters
about.philosophy.dx.description: Code smells physically bother us. Messy architectures impact DX for everyone on the team. We standardize, refactor, and document because we actually care about the next person who touches this code.
about.philosophy.honesty.title: Straight Talk, Always
about.philosophy.honesty.description: If we can't do something, we'll tell you. If there's a better approach than what you asked for, we'll explain why. No sales pitches, no hand-waving—just honest technical guidance.
about.tech_stack.title: Our Tech Stack
about.tech_stack.description: The tools we use to build applications that last
about.values.title: What We Stand For
about.values.craftsmanship.title: Craftsmanship Over Speed
about.values.craftsmanship.description: Business cares about results and income—we get that. But we also care that the code itself is approachable and scalable beyond MVP. When you build something in WordPress, you can get it done quickly. But as soon as you try to reach anything beyond your own box, you're in for some hell. We build the kind that grows with you.
about.values.transparency.title: Transparency & Honesty
about.values.transparency.description: We've spent years inside big-name agencies and seen the smoke-and-mirror tactics up close. We don't play that game. You'll get straight answers, realistic timelines, and code you can actually understand and maintain.
about.values.long_term.title: Long-term Thinking
about.values.long_term.description: £500/day buys you code that doesn't become technical debt six months later. Your future developers will thank you instead of cursing whoever wrote this mess. That's the standard we hold ourselves to.
about.cta.heading: Sound like your kind of team?
about.cta.description: If you value code quality, honest communication, and long-term thinking, let's talk about your project.
work.hero.description: Laravel applications built to last. Here's what we've delivered for clients who value code quality as much as we do.
work.empty.title: Portfolio Coming Soon
work.empty.description: We're currently adding our latest projects. In the meantime, let's talk about yours.
work.cta.heading: Want your project here?
work.cta.description: Let's build something worth showcasing. Laravel applications that scale, perform, and actually get maintained.
work.projects.financial.title: Financial Platform Modernization
work.projects.financial.excerpt: Migrated legacy PHP application to Laravel 11 with zero downtime, comprehensive test coverage, and improved performance.
work.projects.financial.description: Complete modernization of a financial services platform from legacy PHP 5.6 to Laravel 11.
work.projects.financial.challenge: Legacy codebase on PHP 5.6 with no tests, frequent production issues, and security vulnerabilities.
work.projects.financial.solution: Incremental migration to Laravel with comprehensive Pest test suite, PHPStan level 8, CI/CD pipeline, and zero downtime deployment.
work.projects.ecommerce.title: E-commerce Admin Panel
work.projects.ecommerce.excerpt: Built custom Filament v4 admin panel for multi-vendor e-commerce platform with advanced inventory management.
work.projects.ecommerce.description: Complete admin panel solution for managing products, orders, vendors, and inventory.
work.projects.ecommerce.challenge: Off-the-shelf solutions couldn't handle complex multi-vendor workflows and inventory tracking requirements.
work.projects.ecommerce.solution: Custom Filament v4 admin panel with tailored workflows, real-time inventory sync, and vendor portal integration.
work.projects.api.title: API Integration Platform
work.projects.api.excerpt: Developed RESTful API integrating 15+ third-party services including Stripe, Xero, and HubSpot.
work.projects.api.description: Centralized API platform connecting multiple business systems.
work.projects.api.challenge: Client using 15+ disconnected SaaS tools, resulting in data inconsistencies and manual data entry.
work.projects.api.solution: Laravel API with queued jobs, webhook handling, and comprehensive error logging for all integrations.
work.projects.saas.title: SaaS MVP Development
work.projects.saas.excerpt: Built production-ready SaaS MVP in 8 weeks with Stripe billing, team management, and API access.
work.projects.saas.description: Full-stack SaaS application from concept to launch.
work.projects.saas.challenge: Startup needed to validate product-market fit quickly without accumulating technical debt.
work.projects.saas.solution: Laravel 12 + Nuxt.js SaaS with Stripe subscriptions, team management, and comprehensive testing—built to scale.
contact.hero.description: No sales pitches. No hand-waving. Just straight talk from developers who care about the craft.
contact.faq.title: Quick Answers
contact.faq.cost_question: How much does a project cost?
contact.faq.cost_answer: £500/day for development. Full-service projects are priced individually. We'll give you a straight quote based on your actual requirements.
contact.faq.time_answer: Depends on scope. MVPs can launch in 6-12 weeks. Legacy migrations might take 3-6 months. We'll give you realistic timelines upfront.
contact.faq.startups_answer: Absolutely. We build MVPs that can actually scale. Just be prepared for honest feedback if requirements don't match your timeline or budget.
contact.faq.existing_question: Can you take over an existing project?
contact.faq.existing_answer: Yes. We've salvaged plenty of legacy projects. We'll audit your codebase and give you an honest assessment.
